description:
Fennel seizes a chance to see Alyssa when Viola is out. Then, Alyssa and Viola go to Pondo`s farm to dig potatoes, but something isn`t right...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Elf no Mori no Hikoukai Jijou / Ai to Densetsu no Imohori Jijou
The Classified Circumstances of the Elfin Forest / The Potato-Digging Circumstances of Love and Legend
エルフの森の非公開事情 / 愛と伝説の芋掘り事情
